original_title: President Visits Late State Minister Sanath Nishantha’s Home
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – President Ranil Wickremesinghe visited the home of late State Minister Sanath Nishantha and condoled with his wife and four children today (25th).
The state minister died in a motor accident on the Airport Expressway in the early hours of Thursday.
